 2020-01412020-03-13,  ,  NRCAN,  CER,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Energy Regulator Act
SubjectInternational and Interprovincial Power Line Damage Prevention Regulations â€“ Obligations of Holders of Permits and Certificates
PrecisINTERNATIONAL AND INTERPROVINCIAL POWER LINE DAMAGE PREVENTION REGULATIONS - OBLIGATIONS OF HOLDERS OF PERMITS AND CERTIFICATES in order to (1) align with the Canadian Energy Regulator Act's provisions for power line damage prevention; (2) maintain the safety requirements in the regulations; (3) set out the requirements that holders must meet in providing authorizations to conduct specified activities near power lines and in developing their damage prevention programs; (4) enhance safety through coordination of information sharing between holders, one-call centres, and anyone initiating a locate request before starting an activity near a power line; and (5) provide essential information to the Regulator to support compliance monitoring and to ensure safety when activities are conducted near power lines.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0049 Publication Date: 2020-04-01
